scenarioName: Support Agent - Multi-Language Ticket Processing

input.prompt: Handle support ticket in Spanish, respond in user's language
input.ticket: Mi aplicación se bloquea cuando intento iniciar sesión. Error 500.

notes: Support Agent - Multi-Language Ticket Processing. Handle support ticket in Spanish, respond in user's language

scenarioName: Support Agent - OCR Screenshot Analysis

input.prompt: Analyze error screenshot and provide troubleshooting steps

notes: Support Agent - OCR Screenshot Analysis. Analyze error screenshot and provide troubleshooting steps

scenarioName: Support Agent - Sentiment-Based Escalation

input.prompt: Detect angry customer sentiment and escalate ticket
input.ticket: This is the THIRD time reporting this bug! Completely unacceptable! Cancelling subscription!

notes: Support Agent - Sentiment-Based Escalation. Detect angry customer sentiment and escalate ticket

scenarioName: Support Agent - Knowledge Base Auto-Linking

input.prompt: Find relevant KB articles for password reset issue
input.ticket: Can't reset my password, email not arriving
